title: Sustainable Island
description: A low poly island created for Mexican government dependency, CONAFOR, to visually explain various forestry sustainable activities, this was used on social media such as Twitter and Facebook to inform about these activities.
embed: Island by delavegx on Sketchfab

title: Mayan Voxel Island
description: This was my very first time using Magica Voxel. I created this very simple island to test out the power of this software. The geometry was optimized with VoxelShop
embed: VOXEL ISLAND by delavegx on Sketchfab

title: Milagritos VR/AR Game
description: Videogame app developed for PepsiCo in collaboration with Mexican Football Selection. The app had a shooting ball mini game. And augmented or virtual reality interactions with all the selection players. I worked as a 3D animator, implementing animations in the engine, cleaning mo-cap footage and optimization of the game

title: 2018 Motion Graphics Demo Reel
description: Demo Reel that showcases all the 2D animation projects I worked on since 2017.

title: Quantstudio 1 Digital Smart Start 3D Web Training
description: Digital Smart Start (DSS) was a new experience created for Thermofisher to show our customers a new way of understanding purchased equipment. This was the second iteration for this series of products, it changed and develop in a more mature version from the original demo release created for the Evos Microscope. We created from scratch a training system (Unity state machine) that was able to create a sequence of steps. It was a client requirement that users could switch between steps, so our state machine was build in order to properly store all the steps within a module. This state machine was used and updated within all iterations for the DSS series.

title: Qubit Flex Digital Smart Start 3D Web Training
description: Digital Smart Start (DSS) was a new experience created for Thermofisher to show our customers a new way of understanding purchased equipment. This 3D web experience’s purpose is to train Thermofisher customers in how to use, install and run and experiment with the Qubit Flex without the help of any technician on the site. Thus saving money for the company and adding an interactive and innovative experience to customers.

title: Quantstudio 3 and 5 Digital Smart Start 3D Web Training
description: After creating multiple iterations of the DSS and from user feedback we innovate a new way to show our customer a more interactive and user-friendly way to train. From testing and making field research we came with a new solution to completely re-design the DSS series.

title: Swapportunity zap your competition!
description: Inside the game, a sales representative will learn while playing in a virtual world, created from real lab photo references. Three labs were developed for training: Molecular Biology, Cell Biology, and Protein Biology. The goal is for the user to look around the lab and find equipment and then swap it out with the Thermofisher equivalent. This game was showcased in February at the annual Sales conference from Fisher Sci hosted in Florida. It was a total success at the expo! We had multiple people at the time playing the game, and got very positive feedback from it, even from the competition, who also played our game.

title: Continuous Manufacturing Project
description: A prototype project for Thermo Fisher Scientific’s Pharma Services Group. Based on photographic and photogrammetry data provided, an optimized reproduction of a real pharmaceutical manufacturing facility was created, this is to be used on mixed reality platforms for a further population with instruments that could have a training intent inside the Hololens. The goal of this prototype was to showcase customers the facility without them actually visiting the real-life site, this was done due to COVID 19 pandemic safe distance restrictions.
embed: Continuous Manufacturing Project by Alejandro Nanga on Sketchfab

title: Rock-D Sci-Fi Crossbow
description: I model this back when I was a student as homework but never textured the mesh. I did this small project to polish my substance texturing skills.
embed: Sci Fi Crossbow by delavegx on Sketchfab

title: Fisherman's Hut
description: I created this project to test out Unity's HDRP and my Real-Time Render Skills. At first, the water was going to be Unity Shader, I build one with the Shader Graph but in the end, I did not like the result. Thus I switch to a more simple and cartoon material. On the marmoset toolbag viewer, I made the water more transparent so the rock could be more visible.
embed: <iframe width="640" height="360" src="https://www.artstation.com/embed/29971114" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen="true" webkitallowfullscreen="true" onmousewheel="" scrolling="no"> </iframe>

title: Bakery Shop
description: I created this project using a stylized workflow. Was really fun giving detail to some parts such as the bricks, logs wood, and so on Zbrush. Some materials were done from scratch by me using a designer and painter. Again I used HDRender Pipeline from unity for this model to keep improving my Real-Time Rendering skills.
embed: Bakery Shop by delavegx on Sketchfab

title: Line 2 Washer HoloLens 2 Training
description: From photo and manual reference, this digital twin of a Bosch Washer machine was modeled to be implemented in HoloLens2. Its purpose is to train operators in the proper installation of the Washer parts to be then applied to the real one. This project was done for Thermofisher Scientific Pharmaceutical division and in partnership with Altoura. Modeling and Texturing were done with my co-worker Alejandro Nanga
embed: Bosch Washer by delavegx on Sketchfab

title: Another Crusade: Hunter's Settlement
description: Another Crusade is an RPG inspired by old classics. Developed by indie mexican company Dragon Vein Studios. This project started as a Kickstarter, and it was a complete success. The game would be deployed on various platforms in 2022. I participated as a 3D Artist for the level Hunter's Settlement. It is a level filled with Asian-style architecture. The concept art was provided by the studio and I was in charge of modeling, UV mapping, and texturing the whole scene to match the game art. (hand painted).

title: iCELLis Bioreactor Systems
description: The iCELLis bioreactor system was a project developed for Thermofisher Scientific to train operators in the proper installation of the machine. From video and photo reference this digital twin was modeled and then deployed as a Mixed Reality application for the Hololens 2.
embed: <iframe width="640" height="360" src="https://www.artstation.com/embed/46912266" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen="true" webkitallowfullscreen="true" onmousewheel="" scrolling="no"> </iframe>

title: IMA Vaccine Manufacturing Line
description: The IMA line was a project done for a Thermofisher site at Ferentino, Italy. Its purpose is to train operators in the proper installation of this line. From photo reference and a Matteport scan, a digital twin of the real-life IMA Line was created. Using the HoloLens2 operators were immersed in an interactive and refreshing experience.Implementation was done in Unity. Deploy and programming were done using a third party tool.
embed: <iframe width="640" height="360" src="https://www.artstation.com/embed/46911657" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen="true" webkitallowfullscreen="true" onmousewheel="" scrolling="no"> </iframe>
